titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale University Library Gift Acknowledgments
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:04

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of copies of acknowledgments sent to donors by the Acquisitions Department for gifts received by the Yale University Library.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 32-C (YRG 32-C), Records of Yale University Library departments and offices.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the materials is restricted to the office of origin only.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale University Library Gift Acknowledgments (RU 203). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of copies of acknowledgments sent to donors by the Acquisitions Department for gifts received by the Yale University Library.
